profile.name: Reina
profile.title: Lightning Flash Reina
profile.story: Reina von Stein was born the daughter of a noble family of the empire. Her free spirit and energetic personality seem to brighten up even those around her. She prefers a life of freedom as a mercenary over the suffocating life of an aristocrat. After working as a mercenary for a long time, and she's already lost all traces of her noble upbringing in her manners. Even as a child, she showed a natural talent with swords. Over the years, she developed her skills with a rapier, using a style that best suited her lithe physique. Recently, she turned down a strange contract. Ever since then, she has been feeling as if someone has been following and watching her.

uw.name: Lightning Flash, Livatis
uw.description: Each time a critical hit occurs, for 15 sec your Attack Speed is increased by {0} and Critical Damage is increased by {1}%. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
uw.story: The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatis, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

1.name: Medal of Swiftness
1.description: [Float Like a Butterfly] Increases DMG by 20%, and reduces the target's P.Block Chance by 500 for 10 sec.
1.story: A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Hersz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.

2.name: Master's Ring
2.description: [Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional 40 MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
2.story:
The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb. 
It looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring.
Staring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

3.name: Wing of Lightning Flash
3.description: [Shooting Star] Increases DMG by 20% and upon a Crit Hit, recovers Mana by 200.
3.story:
A pair of mystical Ear Cuffs that raise the wearer's speed to the limit.
Nyx gave it as a present to Reina, who kept telling him to open portals since she didn't care for the rigors of traveling. Reina wears this strange item in battle, and she looks like a pretty butterfly flying at lightning speed when she raises her sword.

4.name: Amethyst Pin
4.description: [Lucky Child] Increases the max number of stacks by 2, each stack increasing Crit DMG by 2%.
4.story:
A pin that belongs to Reina's mother, a renowned leader of mercenaries in the Empire.
She gave this pin to her daughter when she left to Orvel Kingdom all alone, hoping it would cast bad luck away. It can also be used as a weapon in case of emergency.
